title: Installing issues
body: I need to reinstall my League of Legends Launcher because of an error. I got the uninstalling part down but, for some reason, whenever I click the link for downloading the game at 'https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload' an error page comes up. I've tried refreshing, clearing cookies and using different browsers. Is anyone else having this problem or has any ideas for how it could be fixed?

replies.body: Thanks for the help! It worked again after I updated my system a few times.

For some reason, it's still not working. It simply comes up with the 'This webpage is not available'  connection error (my wifi is working completely fine on other sites). Going to the Riot Games website comes up with the same thing.

Can you access http://www.riotgames.com or http://support.riotgames.com?

I can confirm that I can access all of these from where I am, but there is an issue that has hit a few players, relating to their ISP having out of date DNS information.

If you are still having trouble, it might be worth checking out [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom) for instructions on changing your DNS.

Hi ArisuKira,

Try [this link](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)

Let me know how it goes

Cheers
Mindstar
